title: Symmetry Restoration in Hartree-Fock-Bogoliubov Based Theories
speaker: 林炜
paperTitle: Symmetry Restoration in Hartree-Fock-Bogoliubov Based Theories
paperAbstract: We present a Pfaffian formula for projection and symmetry restoration for wave functions of the general Bogoliubov form, including quasiparticle excited states and linear combinations of them. This solves a long-standing problem in calculating states of good symmetry, arising from the sign ambiguity of the commonly used determinant formula. A simple example is given of projecting a good particle number and angular momentum from a Bogoliubov wave function in the Fock space of a single j-shell.
